ctx: intros Q a p q Hreduce Hcanon Hzero.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) Hreduce : reduceplus Q p q Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM p Hzero : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a H : eqP A eqA n p q Unable to unify "eqP A eqA n p q" with "reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q (mults multA (n:=n) a p) (mults multA (n:=n) a q)".

original: intros Q a p q Hreduce Hcanon Hzero. inversion Hreduce; subst. - apply reduce_top. + apply H. + apply (Hcanon H). - apply reduce_n. + apply (reduce_mults _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ cs _ _ a0). + apply (H0 H). + apply (Hcanon H).
